question: Which Indian city organized the World Conference on Access to Medical Products: Achieving the SDGs 2030â€™?
explanation: The World Conference on Access to Medical Products Achieving the SDGs 2030 for the year 2019 was held in New Delhi, India. The Conference is a follow on from the 2017 and 2018 World Conference on Access to Medical Products organized in November 2017 and October 2018 by the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare. The Conference is aimed to stir innovative thinking around issues surrounding provisioning of affordable, quality medical products as part of public health care delivery systems.
